about_the_game:
Have you ever wanted to fight like a martial arts gangster? Well, even if you haven’t, you can now with this fun cosmetic upgrade that lets you showcase your skills as a cool gangster.

*This DLC is a set of fighting animations and purely cosmetic. It doesn’t give any advantages in the game whatsoever, but it is always a nice way to support us
detailed_description:

name: The Grandmaster - Gangster Movement Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.0 Gghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 5 Series
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 3.0 ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 7 Series
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
